EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Save $35,000 Per Unit on DU-870 Display Upgrades!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.pentastaraviation.com/]]>
Don’t miss out on significant savings when you upgrade obsolete CRT DU-870 displays to DU-875 LCD displays with Pentastar Aviation.
Right now, Honeywell is offering a $35,000 trade-in credit per display plus additional Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan incentives when you upgrade by June 30th.
Contact Pentastar Aviation to avoid obsolescence and save up to $210,000* by taking advantage of this limited-time display upgrade trade-in promotion.
I WANT TO SAVE ON THE LATEST TECHNOLOGY! <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/DU-875_Upgrade_Pentastar.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_pentastar_du875&utm_content=versiona]]>
*Savings are based on the upgrade of up to six (6) DU-875 LCD screens on Global Express aircraft. Ask us about the savings for your aircraft model.
